form.name: form1

div.span:
On March 30, the governor announced that schools would be closed through May 1st. As we are all aware, this health crisis is a very fluid situation, with things changing on a daily basis. We know that families have a lot of questions and we will continue to provide updates throughout this time.
The school building is closed to the public but we will have limited staff in the building to answer phone calls. The office will be available for phone calls Monday-Thursday from 8:30 am-3:15 pm.
Students are currently scheduled to return to school on Monday, May 4th.

On March 30, the governor announced that schools would be closed through May 1st. As we are all aware, this health crisis is a very fluid situation, with things changing on a daily basis. We know that families have a lot of questions and we will continue to provide updates throughout this time.
As of March 24, the governor has issued a "Stay Home" order. The school building is closed to the public but we will have limited staff in the building to answer phone calls. The office will be available for phone calls Monday-Thursday from 8:30 am-3:15 pm.
You can click read more below to be directed to our School Closure & Distance Learning page which includes news updates, information on meal services, and resources for home.
Students are currently scheduled to return to school on Monday, May 4th.
